mapper.sql: productId, productName, productDescription, productPrice, productStock, categoryId, productFileName, isDelete
mapper.select: select * from easybuy_product p inner join easybuy_product_category c on p.categoryId = c.categoryId
mapper.insert: insert into easybuy_product (productId, productName, productDescription, productPrice, productStock, categoryId, productFileName, isDelete) values (#{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{productstock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})
